text: Ana'ma uhanatia kenegera Ra Anumzamo'a efore humino amanage huno asami'ne, Nagra Abrahamu nafaka'amofo Anumzane, e'igu korora osuo. Nagra kagrane mani'nena asomura hunegantena henka'a kagripinti kegehe'za fore hanamoki'zminena zamazeri hakare hugahue. Na'ankure Abrahamu'a Nagri eri'za vahe mani'negu anara hugahue.
